ivardefs.name: administrationGuideline_
ivardefs.desc: Guidelines or protocols that are applicable for the administration of the medication.

ivardefs.name: amount
ivardefs.desc: Specific amount of the drug in the packaged product.  For example, when specifying a product that has the same strength (For example, Insulin glargine 100 unit per mL solution for injection), this attribute provides additional clarification of the package

ivardefs.name: associatedMedication_
ivardefs.desc: Associated or related medications.  For example, if the medication is a branded product (e.g. Crestor), this is the Therapeutic Moeity (e.g. Rosuvastatin) or if this is a generic medication (e.g. Rosuvastatin), this would link to a branded product (e.g. C

ivardefs.name: clinicalUseIssue_
ivardefs.desc: Potential clinical issue with or between medication(s) (for example, drug-drug interaction, drug-disease contraindication, drug-allergy interaction, etc.).

ivardefs.name: code
ivardefs.desc: A code that specifies this medication, or a textual description if no code is available. Usage note: This could be a standard medication code such as a code from RxNorm, SNOMED CT, IDMP etc. It could also be a national or local formulary code, optionally

ivardefs.name: cost_
ivardefs.desc: The price of the medication.

ivardefs.name: device_
ivardefs.desc: A device associated with the medication (for example, a drug coated catheter or a drug impregnated dressing).

ivardefs.name: doseForm
ivardefs.desc: Describes the form of the item.  Powder; tablets; capsule.

ivardefs.name: drugCharacteristic_
ivardefs.desc: Specifies descriptive properties of the medicine, such as color, shape, imprints, etc.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: Business identifier for this medication.

ivardefs.name: ingredient_
ivardefs.desc: Identifies a particular constituent of interest in the product.

ivardefs.name: intendedRoute_
ivardefs.desc: The intended or approved route of administration.

ivardefs.name: kineticCharacteristic_
ivardefs.desc: The time course of drug absorption, distribution, metabolism and excretion of a medication from the body.

ivardefs.name: manufacturer
ivardefs.desc: Describes the details of the manufacturer of the medication product.  This is not intended to represent the distributor of a medication product.

ivardefs.name: medicineClassification_
ivardefs.desc: Categorization of the medication within a formulary or classification system.

ivardefs.name: monitoringProgram_
ivardefs.desc: The program under which the medication is reviewed.

ivardefs.name: monograph_
ivardefs.desc: Associated documentation about the medication.

ivardefs.name: packaging
ivardefs.desc: Information that only applies to packages (not products).

ivardefs.name: preparationInstruction
ivardefs.desc: The instructions for preparing the medication.

ivardefs.name: productType_
ivardefs.desc: Category of the medication or product (e.g. branded product, therapeutic moeity, generic product, innovator product, etc.).

ivardefs.name: regulatory_
ivardefs.desc: Regulatory information about a medication.

ivardefs.name: relatedMedicationKnowledge_
ivardefs.desc: Associated or related knowledge about a medication.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: A code to indicate if the medication is in active use.  The status refers to the validity about the information of the medication and not to its medicinal properties.

ivardefs.name: synonym_
ivardefs.desc: Additional names for a medication, for example, the name(s) given to a medication in different countries.  For example, acetaminophen and paracetamol or salbutamol and albuterol.

properties.desc: Information about a medication that is used to support knowledge.
